sentences.sentence: And this hopefully then brings to the international community much better picture what is happening and if something unexpected happens we know it quickly.

The Ukrainian general staff stated that Russian President Vladimir Putin has extended the deadline for Russian forces to capture Donetsk region from the 31st of August to the still highly unlikely target date of the 15th of September the Institute for the Study of War says this Russian forces are conducting several redeployments to meet this goal. Not providing any specific date or deadline, Russian President Vladimir Putin reiterated his false framing of Russia's unprovoked invasion of Ukraine as a defensive operation to protect Russia, saying that the purpose of the, quote, special military operation, unquote, is to eliminate the anti-russian enclave that is forming in ukraine putin's reiteration of an anti-russian entity that must be defeated militarily to defend russia reaffirms his maximalist intentions for ukraine and is likely intended to set the information conditions to call for further russian efforts and force generation going into the fall and winter of this year.

Yet most big oil importers will need to comply for this to be successful and it's not certain that they will. The Wadden Sea in the Netherlands is the largest tidal flat system in the world

sentences.sentence: Yet its leader believes Kosovo has been too rigid in its approach with Serbia.

sentences.sentence: Everyone knows that I'm 100% sided with the Kosovo government when it comes to the recognition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But it's not a secret that I have a different view than the Kosovo government when it comes to the dialogue with Serbia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Pristina wants ethnically Serb residents from the north of the territory to use Kosovo license plates and identity documents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But to many Serbs, this is a step too far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I don't see any solution at the moment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: From September 1st they will certainly continue with their campaign and try to force Serbs to change their licence plates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I don't think he will be very successful in that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And the Kosovo PM said at the talks in Brussels that he believes he will be very successful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: No country in the region wants this disagreement to escalate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Brussels successfully negotiated a partial deal on the matter in August, but it was exactly that, partial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Dozens of taxis all gathered in exactly the same place in western Moscow, creating gridlock and forcing drivers to avoid the lengthy tailbacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Now the reason for this traffic jam?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Well Russia's largest ride-hailing service, Yandex Taxis, said that it was hit by a cyber-attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It says that on Thursday morning its drivers received dozens of fake calls all leading them to the same location. This disrupted Yandex's services and led to the gridlock that you can see. In a statement they confirmed that they had received an attempt to target Yandex services and they said that as a result of this the algorithm for detecting and preventing such attacks has now been improved to prevent similar incidents from taking place in the future. They also said that those drivers who had potentially been stuck in traffic for up to 40 minutes would in the future receive compensation. Now it's not clear exactly who was behind this cyber attack but it comes amid Russia's ongoing war in Ukraine where we've seen fighting on the ground but also online. And this is not the first time that a Russian company has recently been targeted by a cyber attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: For example, earlier this year, hackers managed to infiltrate a number of Russian state television channels, replacing their coverage with independent footage of the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: As a result of this latest cyber attack targeting Yandex taxis, Russian authorities say that the investigation is ongoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Harry Potter enthusiasts return to the back to Hogwarts event after a two-year hiatus due to the coronavirus pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Marking the new year, students can test out their wizarding skills in the special wand training workshop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's incredible you know when I was approached to do this and back in 2006 to be honest the person who saw this was David Yates who's the director of the last four Harry Potter's and the Fantastic Beasts, he said, mate, there'll be people, kids all over the world doing this in 10 years' time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And now it's way more than 10 years' time and they still are.
